column4: ok, stupid question, but I have to ask before I give up: Assuming you were working on a document within a live-cd environment on a flahs drive  and you had spent a lot of time on it, regularly saving it to my documents. Then, you do something stupid like pull the plug accidentally, and when you boot the live-cd flash drive back up and everything is returned to default and no files are in my documents. Is there any chance to reco
ah, testdisk.. I know my way around with that one
